response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential long-term benefits it could bring to you. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests and presents an excellent chance for both parties to benefit. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
